summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank as of December 31, 2016. It details various outgoing money transfers to different accounts, including those associated with Lee McKenzie Consultants, LLC and Prosolar Systems LLC, among others.

keyFacts: The document details Jeffrey Epstein's account balance at Deutsche Bank as of December 31, 2016.
Multiple outgoing transfers were made from Epstein's account to various entities, including Lee McKenzie Consultants, LLC and Prosolar Systems LLC.
The total balance at the end of the statement period was $118,620.37.
There were no overdraft fees reported for the calendar year.
The document includes instructions for disputing errors on the account statement.
